amber-earrings.where: Sold at the jewelry shop in Gerudo Town (Starlight Memories).

ancient-cuirass.where: Purchase from the Akkala Ancient Tech Lab after 'Robbie's Research' (requires Ancient materials).

ancient-greaves.where: Purchase from the Akkala Ancient Tech Lab after 'Robbie's Research' (requires Ancient materials).

ancient-helm.where: Purchase from the Akkala Ancient Tech Lab after 'Robbie's Research' (requires Ancient materials).

barbarian-armor.where: Found in a treasure chest inside South Lomei Labyrinth (Gerudo Desert).

barbarian-helm.where: Found in a treasure chest inside Lomei Labyrinth Island (Akkala).

barbarian-leg-wraps.where: Found in a treasure chest inside North Lomei Labyrinth (Hebra).

cap-of-the-hero.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

cap-of-the-sky.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

cap-of-the-wild.where: Reward for completing all shrines: found in chests in the Forgotten Temple (Wild Set).

cap-of-the-wind.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

cap-of-time.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

cap-of-twilight.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

champions-tunic.where: Given by Impa during the main quest 'Captured Memories'.

climbers-bandanna.where: Chest in Ree Dahee Shrine (Dueling Peaks).

climbing-boots.where: Chest in Tahno O'ah Shrine (Mount Lanayru).

climbing-gear.where: Chest in Chaas Qeta Shrine (Tenoko Island, off Hateno Bay).

desert-voe-headband.where: Sold by the Gerudo Secret Club in Gerudo Town.

desert-voe-spaulder.where: Sold by the Gerudo Secret Club in Gerudo Town.

desert-voe-trousers.where: Sold by the Gerudo Secret Club in Gerudo Town.

diamond-circlet.where: Sold at Starlight Memories (Gerudo Town). Also found in a treasure chest beneath Tu Ka'loh Shrine on Lomei Labyrinth Island (Akkala).

fierce-deity-armor.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

fierce-deity-boots.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

fierce-deity-mask.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

flamebreaker-armor.where: Sold in Goron City; the torso piece is also given during 'Fireproof Lizard Roundup'.

flamebreaker-boots.where: Sold in Goron City; the torso piece is also given during 'Fireproof Lizard Roundup'.

flamebreaker-helm.where: Sold in Goron City; the torso piece is also given during 'Fireproof Lizard Roundup'.

hylian-hood.where: Sold at the clothing shops in Hateno Village and Kakariko Village.

hylian-trousers.where: Sold at the clothing shops in Hateno Village and Kakariko Village.

hylian-tunic.where: Sold at the clothing shops in Hateno Village and Kakariko Village.

opal-earrings.where: Sold at the jewelry shop in Gerudo Town (Starlight Memories).

radiant-mask.where: Sold in Gerudo Town at the Clothing Boutique (Radiant Set).

radiant-shirt.where: Sold in Gerudo Town at the Clothing Boutique (Radiant Set).

radiant-tights.where: Sold in Gerudo Town at the Clothing Boutique (Radiant Set).

rubber-armor.where: Found in a treasure chest in Toh Yahsa Shrine (Thundra Plateau).

rubber-helm.where: Reward for the side quest 'Thunder Magnet' at Lakeside Stable.

rubber-tights.where: Found in a treasure chest in Qukah Nata Shrine (near Calora Lake).

ruby-circlet.where: Sold at the jewelry shop in Gerudo Town (Starlight Memories).

sand-boots.where: Earned via Bozai side quests (then can be repurchased from Granté if sold).

sapphire-circlet.where: Sold at the jewelry shop in Gerudo Town (Starlight Memories).

sheiks-mask.where: Random drop from treasure chests created by scanning the Sheik amiibo (Super Smash Bros. series).

snow-boots.where: Earned via Bozai side quests (then can be repurchased from Granté if sold).

snowquill-headdress.where: Sold in Rito Village's armor shop (Snowquill Set).

snowquill-trousers.where: Sold in Rito Village's armor shop (Snowquill Set).

snowquill-tunic.where: Sold in Rito Village's armor shop (Snowquill Set).

soldiers-armor.where: Sold in Hateno Village's armor shop (Soldier's Set).

soldiers-greaves.where: Sold in Hateno Village's armor shop (Soldier's Set).

soldiers-helm.where: Sold in Hateno Village's armor shop (Soldier's Set).

stealth-chest-guard.where: Sold in Kakariko Village at Enchanted (Stealth Set).

stealth-mask.where: Sold in Kakariko Village at Enchanted (Stealth Set).

stealth-tights.where: Sold in Kakariko Village at Enchanted (Stealth Set).

topaz-earrings.where: Sold at the jewelry shop in Gerudo Town (Starlight Memories).

trousers-of-the-sky.where: Exclusive to Amiibo treasure chest drops (scan the matching Zelda-series amiibo).

vah-medoh-divine-helm.where: Random drop from treasure chests created by scanning the Revali amiibo (Breath of the Wild series) (requires v1.3.3+).

vah-naboris-divine-helm.where: Random drop from treasure chests created by scanning the Urbosa amiibo (Breath of the Wild series) (requires v1.3.3+).

vah-rudania-divine-helm.where: Random drop from treasure chests created by scanning the Daruk amiibo (Breath of the Wild series) (requires v1.3.3+).

zora-armor.where: Main quest reward during 'Divine Beast Vah Ruta' (received from King Dorephan at Zora's Domain).

zora-greaves.where: Reward for the side quest 'Lynel Safari' in Zora's Domain.

zora-helm.where: Found in a treasure chest at Toto Lake (north of Zora's Domain); pull it up with Magnesis.
